metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46873 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description: WireGuard, such as WireGuard 0.5.3 on Windows, does not fully account for the possibility that an adversary might be able to set a victim's system time to a future value, e.g., because unauthenticated NTP is used. This can lead to an outcome in which one static private key becomes permanently useless.

criterions.comment: wireguard package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
